title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. D, pt. 270 - Incorporation Of Certain Regulations Of The State Tax Commission With Respect To Article 22 Of The Tax Law
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. D, pt. 270 - Incorporation Of Certain Regulations Of The State Tax Commission With Respect To Article 22 Of The Tax Law

State Regulations
§ 270.1 - Time and place for filing City of Yonkers earnings tax returns and payment of City of Yonkers earnings tax
§ 270.2 - Signing of City of Yonkers earnings tax returns and other documents
§ 270.3 - Extensions of time
§ 270.4 to 270.28 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. D, pt. 270

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 697[a], 1342; Codes
and Ordinances of the City of Yonkers, §
92-113

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
